homeProductsSlogan: Unified Platform of Digital Products and APIs for SMEs and Startups focused on LATAM.
devText:
In addition to our dashboards, Cubiq provides a single, elegant interface that abstracts away all the complexity of enterprise integrations.

With ready-made APIs to integrate each of our products into your own system.
devConfira: Also check out our editor themes for
quote: Cubiq offers enterprise-level technology in modular and efficient pieces ‚Äî an In-House Product Platform, APIs and Custom Developments, designed for modern Startups & SMEs. Plus a Development and Innovation Lab.
aboutText:
We are a vertically integrated Digital Products Platform and a Development & Innovation Lab focused on LATAM.

We offer a Unified Platform of Products & APIs focused on innovation in the areas of E‚ÄëCommerce, Cross‚ÄëBorder Payments with Instant BTC/USDT Settlements, and Artificial Intelligence Applied to IT Physical Assets Monitoring.

We specialize in delivering Tailored Technology Solutions for Small and Medium Enterprises, helping them bridge to the future with premium services at fair prices, while we also promote and facilitate the adoption of Bitcoin among our clients and supporters.

We believe in verifiable transparency for costs and in correcting inefficiencies in companies through technology.

We believe in technology that improving people's lives and business outcomes.

We believe AI is the new electricity ‚Äî Intelligence powering new human actions and achievements. We also believe that money is one of the consequences of creating excellent products and solving people's and businesses' problems.

We are efficient and minimalist. We build for the long term. We aim to create high‚Äëperformance systems while optimizing resources. We use what works best, we do not reinvent the wheel, nor do we charge for it. We are techno-optimists.

// We design, we experiment, we ship!

We experiment with new technologies in our Lab.

From the integration of Lightspark‚Äôs APIs for International Instant Settlements via Lightning Network, an MCP Server to allow LLMs place orders in our E‚ÄëCommerce clients ‚Äî Store ‚Äî up to Pay‚ÄëPer‚ÄëUse tools for Nostr enthusiasts.

Some experiments fail, they do not become products ‚Äî but rather knowledge gained in the form of tools & libraries for developers, designs and articles.

Sometimes ideas do not go beyond paper ‚Äîso we let them mature in the Idea Lab.

// The stack.

The Cubiq tech stack is simple yet powerful: Svelte & Figma for the front-end, Claude for vibe coding, NestJS for our APIs, Python, Transformers.js & Tensorflow.js for AI, MicroPython for embedded systems, Docker for containerization, Bitcoin & USDT via Lightning for payments, value preservation & transmission, Vercel, Render, Cloudflare & Self-Hosting for cloud infrastructure.

We support open, global and permissionless protocols (Bitcoin, MCP, Nostr, WebRTC, etc) & Self-Hosting & Home-Labbing.

We solve our own and our partners' problems using technology ‚Äî and from this experiences, we create Products & APIs of value for the real world.

We like working with forward-thinking clients, with optimists!

// OS.

We feed on open-source, so we contribute to open-source. Many of the libraries we create are free and open. Sometimes even complete projects!

Got a crazy idea? Let‚Äôs talk, we'll love it ‚Äî Get in touch!

Be bold, let‚Äôs create the future together!

careSyncSlogan:
Take care of your business, 
we take care of your IT
ctaText: Tell us about your challenges ‚Äî at Cubiq, we love overcoming them. We can help with everything from technical best practices to plans and pricing.
payPerUseDescription: Manage your clients' IT assets in real time, create and send service, repair, and alert reports, access clients in the Marketplace, and much more on our ITMS platform for a predictable fixed cost.
payPerUseFeatureOnline: QR Code Labeling Systems For Tracking
payPerUseFeatureTransparentDashboard:
Zero fees
Total transparency via the Dashboard
bagityBasicDescription: Plan that provides full access to the platform, with a store ready to sell, payment integration via Cubiq Pay + all essential features. Customization is optional, task-based, ideal for those who want cost control and autonomy.
bagityPro: Store PRO+
bagityProDescription: Commission-based model per sale (depending on revenue), designed for those seeking a premium e-commerce, without worrying about technology. We take care of everything ‚Äî Design, Development, and Hosting ‚Äî with all customizations included.
bagityFeature1Desc: AI content generation, MCP Server for communication with LLMs, high-performance headless frontends, automated support, and more.
bagityFeature2Desc: We study the competition to create solutions tailored to your segment. We align strategies in onboarding meetings.
bagityFeature3Desc: Quality API and Webhook integrations with major ERPs and custom development in the Pro Plan.
bagityFeature4Desc: We handle the design to create unique stores using next-generation Headless technology. Avoid being just another online store.
bagityFeature5Desc: We want to build unique stores, for unique clients, and with focus on the human factor. That‚Äôs why we follow up with all our clients through monthly video calls.
bagityFeature6Desc: Our proprietary payment solution ‚Äî Cubiq:Pay ‚Äî lets us streamline checkout, achieve high conversion rates, and reduce operational costs.
bagityFeature7Desc: Our headless technology allows you to connect your store to any backend or API, resulting in fast, modular, and multi-channel interfaces.
bagityFeature8Desc: Integration with our first-contact chatbot trained with AI to represent your brand, answer questions, qualify leads, and automatically connect to your CRM.
caresyncFeature01Desc: We track the complete lifecycle of your equipment. From acquisition and technical assistance to final disposal, we offer real-time monitoring and full control via a dashboard.
caresyncFeature02Desc: No matter where your employees are ‚Äî in Brazil or abroad ‚Äî we provide fast incident resolution and user support to prevent productivity loss.
caresyncFeature03Desc: Through the proactive execution of scheduled maintenance for each asset, we significantly reduce the risk of failures, extending the lifetime of equipments and boosting productivity.
caresyncFeature04Desc: To give you peace of mind we perform secure backups so that, in case of a failure, the system can be recovered cleanly with secure restoration and reinstallation.
caresyncFeature1Desc: Monitor our entire management through our dashboards. Generate reports on costs, services and performance, ensuring full transparency!
caresyncFeature2Desc: We don't charge commissions from either professionals or Marketplace customers. Our model is simple: fixed, affordable costs aligned with our mission to improve the IT world!
caresyncFeature3Desc: Whether you are an IT professional or a customer, the Cubiq Care Community and Marketplace are available 24/7 to offer or hire services.
caresyncFeature4Desc: Install our predictive monitoring software and get 24/7 coverage for anomaly detection and failure prediction with our AI trained to generate proactive alerts.
caresyncFeature5Desc: Manage your asset inventory through our dashboards, with service management, alerts, maintenance scheduling and email reports containing a monthly summary.
caresyncFeature6Desc: We provide a knowledge base for IT technicians with tutorials and courses so you can advance in your professional journey and deliver great service to your clients. Having trouble opening a chassis? Check the video in the knowledge base.
caresyncFeature7Desc: You can not only send automated reports of completed jobs and alerts to your clients, but also rely on a billing and expense-control module integrated with Cubiq Pay.
caresyncFeature8Desc: All platform customers will have access to our store to buy equipment and parts at the best princes on the market.
careSyncFeaturedSlogan: We manage and maintain all your equipment, providing full support to your employees to prevent any loss of productivity. Take care of your business, we take care of your IT.
careHaaSFeature1Desc: Receive each device fully configured with systems, software, security policies, and pre-testing, ensuring fast, standardized deployment and ready-to-use equipment for your team.
careHaaSSlogan:
Rent your equipment from anywhere with maintenance included. Whether you're an individual or a company, free up cash flow.
You focus on your business, we take care of your IT!
careHaaSFeature2Desc: We deliver to all states with tracking, flexible scheduling, and structured reverse logistics for exchanges, returns, pickups, and equipment relocations in any region.
careStoreSlogan: Get access to our equipment and parts store with the best prices on the market.
careHaaSFeature3Desc: We offer repairs, quick technical analysis, and immediate replacement of equipment in case of failure, reducing downtime and ensuring operational continuity.
careHaaSFeature4Desc: Highly flexible contracts, from a single day of use to long-term projects. We scale according to your demand, enabling complete fleets, expansions, and adjustments without bureaucracy.
careHaaSFeature5Desc: Full technical support included, with ticket creation, expert guidance, preventive maintenance, system updates, and continuous monitoring of equipment performance.
careHaaSFeature6Desc: Eliminate large upfront expenses, preserve cash flow and credit lines, avoid tying up capital in non-essential investments, and avoid travel or research needed to buy equipment.
careStoreFeature2Desc: If you are already a Cubiq Care customer, you will receive cumulative cashback on all products purchases made directly through our store.
careStoreFeatureRentDesc: Access the Cubiq Store to rent new equipment with maintenance included and immediate replacement. Everything is 100% configured with your security policies and ready to use, preserving your company's cash flow.
finxPayMainTitle: Real-time global payments with security and focus on Latin America
finxPayMainSubtitle: Receive USDT/BTC from anywhere in the world and settle instantly, in your wallet, with verifiable transparency
finxPayExampleTitle: An example of how Cubiq Pay can help your business
finxPayExampleSubtitle: A Colombian online course platform sells to Argentine students.
finxPayExampleStep2: The platform converts to USDT automatically.
finxPayExampleStep3: The amount is settled instantly in the company‚Äôs wallet in Colombia, with no hidden fees.
finxEnterpriseText: Custom financial solutions for those with high transaction volumes who need fast and efficient reconciliation, with high conversion rates and system integration. All of this 24/7, simple and 100% compliant!
finxStartupsText: As a tech company, we understand that speed and good documentation are key. Our API is easy to integrate, allowing your team to focus on growing your business.
finxEcommerce: Increase your conversion rate, simplify reconciliation, enable payment splits, transparent checkout, payment links, recurring Pix, and partial or full transaction reversals.
allCoursesSlogan: Grow your TI career with foundational specializations and skill-specific short courses taught by leaders in the field.

confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
notesWarningUnencrypteed: Warning! Unencrypted notes will be plain text accessible on browser local storage even after logout!
heroContentLab: Beyond our Products Platform, at Cubiq Lab we experiment with new technologies, ideas, and proofs-of-concept.
labProductsSlogan: Projects from our technology lab range from proof-of-concepts to in-market products... learn more
storeDesignFigma: We handle the design in Figma
storeCustomERPsAPIs: Custom ERPs and APIs to start strong
storeNoCommissions: No hidden or per sale commissions
labNostrFollowbackDescription: Discover who doesn't follow you back on Nostr: This is a concept micro-app with the goal of having a first contact with the Nostr Protocol, and trying out libraries like NDK by pablof7z.
labBzStatsDescription: A Node.js+Playwright script that automatically scrapes earnings data from affiliate programs using the Netrefer platform, compares it with the previous run, and sends alerts via Telegram or Email.
labLoveInABoxDescription: ‚ù§Ô∏è LoveInABox is a cooking app where you will be able to discover new recipes and order a cute little kit with the ingredients to cook them. Like HelloFresh¬Æ on steroids.
labViiVPayDescription: Cross-border financial technology with a focus in the LATAM market project and app designed in Figma. Transparent Borderless Payments.
careAccessStoreDesc: Find everything for your infrastructure: rentals, equipment, licensed software and accessories. Manage and purchase your IT in one place.
careCompleteFocus: Total Productivity, Priority Support and Predictability
careLifecycleManagementDescription: Lifecycle management includes tracking asset health, planning upgrades, and managing end-of-life transitions to maximize equipment value.
careBackupRecoveryDescription: Backup and recovery services ensure your critical data is protected and can be restored quickly in case of system failure.
careMonitoringDashboardsDescription: Access real-time dashboards to monitor asset performance, health metrics, and receive alerts for potential issues before they become critical.
careExtraRemoteSupportHourCostDescriptio: Access unlimited expert support beyond the hours included in your plan (1h/3h). Ensure immediate resolution of any incident and maintain maximum operational continuity for your IT assets, paying only for the extra time you actually use.
carePricingFooter: All prices are transparent with no hidden fees
careEmergencyMaintenanceDescription: The On-Demand Corrective Maintenance is for unexpected equipment failures outside of scheduled preventive maintenance. This covers hardware malfunctions, system crashes, and other urgent issues. Remote diagnosis is always included in your monthly plan at no extra charge. If an on-site visit is required, there is a service call fee plus the cost of any replacement parts needed. Complete plan clients receive discounted rates.
timelineDec2024Item2Desc: Voting points earning endpoint and API security with Betizen implementation
timelineDec2024Item4Desc: Initial Authentication and Vote Registration service optimized for high performance with persistence proof via SQLite (WAL mode).
timelineNov2024Desc: Cubiq sets sail with the goal of offering advanced technological solutions for SMEs; and an experimentation space with in-house tech products, focusing on open and permissionless protocols.
